title: A brief account of a tour through some parts of Scotland
author: Hunter, Robert
snippet: It is let toone individual, who pays a large rent for it,no other being alloAved to ply.—About threemiles from Montrose, at the extremity ofthe sands, there is a hill or rising ground, onthe top of Avhich stands the village of St.Cyrus, where the Rev. Dr. Keith, author ofthe work on Prophecy, resides.
